farm.name: Farm
farm.description: Farmers can produce foods from here

irrigation.name: Irrigation System
irrigation.description: Increases farm productivity. You can build 1 irrigation system per 1 farm. City needs water resource to build more than 1 irrigation system. When a hero has been assigned, farm production increases depends on the authority of the hero.

clay.name: Clay pit
clay.description: Workers can quarry clay from here

mud.name: Mud pit
mud.description: Workers can collect mud from here

wood.name: Lumber yard
wood.description: Workers can collect woods from here. Only one lumber yard is allowed to build unless the city has wood resource.

stone.name: Quarry
stone.description: Workers can quarry stone from here. Only one quarry is allowed to build unless the city has stone resource.

tin.name: Tin mine
tin.description: Workers can mine tin from here

copper.name: Copper mine
copper.description: Workers can mine copper from here

livestock.name: Ranch
livestock.description: Workers can breed livestock from here. -1 base hygiene.

wool.name: Sheep farm
wool.description: Workers can collect wool from sheep

kishite livestock.name: Ranch
kishite livestock.description: Workers can breed livestock from here. -1 hygiene.

kishite wool.name: Sheep farm
kishite wool.description: Workers can collect wool from sheep

brick.name: Brickyard
brick.description: Artisans can make bricks from here

polished stone.name: Stonemasonry
polished stone.description: Artisans can polish stone from here

egyptian polished stone.name: Stonemasonry
egyptian polished stone.description: Artisans can polish stone from here

residence.name: Residential Area
residence.description: The place where people lives. When a hero has been assigned, population growth rate increases depends on the wisdom of hero.

pottery.name: Pottery
pottery.description: Artisans can make pottery from here

cloth.name: Weaver
cloth.description: Artisans can weave wool to make clothes from here

market.name: Market
market.description: Merchants can distribute basic goods from here. More variety of goods will give more happiness.

warehouse.name: Storage Pit
warehouse.description: Various resources can be stored here

trade.name: Trading Post
trade.description: You need 1 trading post per 5 resource to trade.

beer.name: Brewery
beer.description: Priests can make beer from here

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: Priests can serve beer to the people from here

tablet.name: Kiln
tablet.description: Artisans can make clay tablet from here

library.name: Library
library.description: Scribes can manage manpower from here. From 3,000 population, city needs libraries to increase its manpower. +10 available manpower per month until 1/3 of city population

sumerian library.name: Library
sumerian library.description: Scribe can manage manpower from here. From 3,000 population, city needs libraries to increase its manpower. +10 available manpower per month until 1/3 of city population

flax.name: Flax farm
flax.description: Farmers can grow flax from here

egyptian cloth.name: Weaver
egyptian cloth.description: Artisans can weave flax fibers to make clothes from here

papyrus sedge.name: Papyrus farm
papyrus sedge.description: Farmers can grow papyrus sedge from here

papyrus.name: Papyrus maker
papyrus.description: Artisans can make papyrus from here

egyptian library.name: Library
egyptian library.description: Scribe can manage manpower from here. From 3,000 population, city needs libraries to increase its manpower. +10 available manpower per month until 1/3 of city population

wall.name: City wall
wall.description: Increase city defense. When a hero has been assigned, wall defense increases depends on the valor of the hero.

leather.name: Tannery
leather.description: Artisans can produce leather from here

furnace.name: Furnace
furnace.description: Artisan can combine copper and tin to make bronze from here

toolsmith.name: Toolsmith
toolsmith.description: Artisan can make tool from here

melee.name: Weaponsmith (Melee)
melee.description: Artisan can make melee weapons from here

ranged.name: Weaponsmith (Ranged)
ranged.description: Artisan can make ranged weapons from here

armoursmith.name: Armoursmith
armoursmith.description: Artisan can make armours from here

armoury.name: Armoury
armoury.description: Weapons and armours can be stored at here

workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.description: Artisan can make cart from here

palace.name: Palace
palace.description: Activates chancellor function. +1 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

anu ziggurat.name: Anu ziggurat
anu ziggurat.description: Ziggurat dedicated to sky god An. +3 max happiness, +2 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

ziggurat.name: Ziggurat
ziggurat.description: Massive structure for worship of gods. +2 max happiness,  +1 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

eanna.name: Eanna
eanna.description: District dedicated to goddess Inanna. +5% base population growth rate, +0.05 happiness/month

nanna.name: E-kish-nu-gal
nanna.description: Temple dedicated to god of moon Nanna. +5% base population growth rate, Grants happiness growth bonus depends on the wisdom of the governor.

abzu.name: E-abzu
abzu.description: Temple dedicated to god of water Enki. +5 hygiene

babbar.name: E-babbar
babbar.description: Temple dedicated to sun god Utu. +0.05 happiness/month

shara.name: E-mah
shara.description: Temple dedicated to minor god of war Shara. -5% happiness cost of employing military unit

ninlil.name: Temple of Ninlil
ninlil.description: Temple dedicated to goddess Ninlil. +5% farm production

dumuzid.name: E-dumi-zi-abzu
dumuzid.description: Temple dedicated to god of shepherds Dumuzid. +5% wool production

nisaba.name: Temple of Nisaba
nisaba.description: Temple dedicated to goddess Nisaba. +2% farm production

urash.name: E-ibe-Anu
urash.description: Temple dedicated to goddess of earth Urash. +2% farm production, +2 max happiness

ekur.name: Ekur
ekur.description: Garden of the gods.  +5 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

ninhursag.name: E-mah
ninhursag.description: Temple dedicated to goddess Ninhursag. +10% base population growth rate

eshumesha.name: Eshumesha
eshumesha.description: Temple dedicated to god Ninurta. +5% farm production

sikil.name: E-sikil
sikil.description: Temple dedicated to god Ninazu. +2 hygiene

pabilsag.name: Temple of Pabilsag
pabilsag.description: Temple dedicated to god of trees Pabilsag. +10% wood production

inshushinak.name: Temple of Inshushinak
inshushinak.description: Temple dedicated to god Inshushinak, protector deity of Susa. +10% militia damage

banebdjedet.name: Temple of Banebdjedet
banebdjedet.description: Temple dedicated to ram god Banebdjedet. +10% wool production

per aat.name: Per Aat
per aat.description: Great House dedicated to sun god Atum. +5 max happiness

neith.name: Temple of Neith
neith.description: Temple dedicated to goddess Neith. +2% base population growth, +2 hygiene, -2% happiness cost of employing military unit, Grants happiness growth bonus depends on the wisdom of the governor

wadjet.name: Temple of Wadjet
wadjet.description: Temple dedicated to goddess Wadjet. +10% militia damage

ptah.name: Hout-ka-Ptah
ptah.description: Great Temple dedicated to creator god Ptah. +10% building construction speed

heryshaf.name: Temple of Heryshaf
heryshaf.description: Temple dedicated to god Heryshaf. Grants happiness growth bonus depends on the valor of the governor

inpu.name: Temple of Inpu
inpu.description: Temple dedicated to god Inpu. +2 hygiene, +10% moral decrease rate of the invaders

anhur.name: Temple of Anhur
anhur.description: Temple dedicated to god of war Anhur. -10% happiness cost of employing military unit

horus.name: Temple of Horus
horus.description: Temple dedicated to hawk god Horus. +5 max happiness

khnum.name: Temple of Khnum
khnum.description: Temple dedicated to god Khnum. +5 hygiene

hathor.name: Temple of Hathor
hathor.description: Temple dedicated to goddess Hathor. +3% base population growth, +0.03 happiness per month

djoser.name: Pyramid of Djoser
djoser.description: Step Pyramid built for the burial of pharaoh Djoser. +1 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

meidum pyramid.name: Pyramid of Meidum
meidum pyramid.description: Pyramid built for pharaoh Huni. +1 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

bent pyramid.name: Bent Pyramid
bent pyramid.description: Bent Pyramid built by pharaoh Sneferu. +1 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

red pyramid.name: Red Pyramid
red pyramid.description: Third Pyramid built by pharaoh Sneferu. +1 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

great pyramid.name: Great Pyramid of Giza
great pyramid.description: Great Pyramid built by pharaoh Khufu. +2 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

djedefre.name: Pyramid of Djedefre
djedefre.description: Pyramid built by pharaoh Djedefre. +2 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

khafre.name: Pyramid of Khafre
khafre.description: Pyramid built by pharaoh Khafre. +2 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

baka.name: Pyramid of Baka
baka.description: Pyramid built by pharaoh Baka. +1 max happiness faction wide when the city is capital

great sphinx.name: Great Sphinx
great sphinx.description: Limestone statue of a reclining sphinx. +0.01 happiness/month
